title: generate multiple choice questions from pdf
description: Test the API endpoint responsible for generating multiple choice questions from uploaded PDF files using AI. Verify that the questions are correctly generated, relevant to the content, and returned in the expected format.

title: generate educational flashcards from pdf
description: Test the API endpoint that generates educational flashcards from PDF content using AI. Ensure flashcards contain accurate front and back content and are properly structured for user study.

title: populate educational materials from pdf
description: Test the API endpoint that extracts and structures educational content from PDF files for use in study modules. Verify the content is correctly parsed, structured, and stored in the system.

title: create stripe checkout session
description: Test the API endpoint that creates a Stripe checkout session for user payments. Verify that the session is created successfully with correct pricing, user details, and plan information.

title: verify stripe payment status
description: Test the API endpoint that verifies Stripe payment status after checkout. Ensure that payment verification is accurate, updates user subscription status, and triggers confirmation emails.

title: parse pdf content for educational use
description: Test the API endpoint that parses PDF files to extract educational content. Verify that the parsing is accurate, handles various PDF formats, and returns structured data for further processing.
